mapper.update: UPDATE message SET is_read = true WHERE id=#{id} AND is_read = false
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO message ( title, content, sender_type, sender_id, sender_name, receiver_type, receiver_id, msg_type, is_read, create_time ) VALUES
(#{msg.title}, #{msg.content}, #{msg.senderType}, #{msg.senderId}, #{msg.senderName}, #{msg.receiverType}, #{msg.receiverId}, #{msg.msgType}, #{msg.isRead}, #{msg.createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, sender_type AS senderType, sender_id AS senderId, receiver_type AS receiverType, receiver_id AS receiverId, sender_name AS senderName, msg_type AS msgType, is_application AS isApplication, app_status AS appStatus, admin_remark AS adminRemark, is_read AS isRead, create_time AS createTime FROM message WHERE receiver_type = #{receiverType} AND receiver_id = #{receiverId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
